comment.author: 68512117@N02
comment._content:
14th AF  308th BG  373rd BS
Standing, L-R: Earl Tipler (engineer), Charles Hawes (armorer), Arthur Goemer (radio op), Robert Lightfoot (engineer), David McNeil (armorer), Robert Kowalkowski (engineer).
Kneeling, L)-R:  Jack Boyd (bombardier), George Hecathorn (navigator), Tom Huston (copilot), Luverne Freeman (pilot)

[one of the men listed as a flight engineer is probably the second radio operator]
